name: tacsa-branch-sentinel
description: Formatter for customer status bar to help identify git repos and manage commits, branches and development.

commands.title: TacSA: Mark Current Branch as PROD (Repo Rule)
TacSA: Mark Current Branch as DEV (Repo Rule)
TacSA: Mark Current Branch as NEUTRAL (Repo Rule)

tacsaBranchSentinel.enableStatusBarTint.description: Enable status bar background tinting based on the current Git branch (workspace setting).

tacsaBranchSentinel.defaultProdBranches.description: Default list of branches treated as production if no per-repo override exists.

tacsaBranchSentinel.branchColors.description: Map of branch name -> status bar background color (hex).

tacsaBranchSentinel.repoRules.description: Per-repo branch rules. Key = repo folder name. Value = { prod: [], dev: [], neutral: [] }.

tacsaBranchSentinel.iconProd.description: Codicon name for prod (master/main). Example: beaker, tools, rocket.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
